0P00008SOL.HK.long_name: BCOM Joyful Retirement MPF Scheme-BCOM MPF Conservative Fund
0P00008SOL.HK.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to obtain a return that is higher than the prescribed savings rate.

0P00008SUL.HK.long_name: Sun Life MPF Comprehensive Scheme Conservative Porttfolio
0P00008SUL.HK.summary:
The objective is to achieve returns, after expenses, which match or exceed Hong Kong Dollar savings rate. 
 The target asset allocation is 100% money market instruments and deposit. It is a low risk fund portfolio and appropriate for investors who are close to retirement and not willing to accept any investment risk (Please note that the interest earned may be less than inflation). The fund invests in a single approved pooled investment fund managed by ING Life Insurance Company (Bermuda) Limited and may also hold cash up to 5% of its assets.
